title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, the key should be allowed to be blank, but it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and go to the localization settings.
2. Add a new localization key, but leave the key field blank.
3. Save the settings and try to display the externalized text in the chart.
